definition: making things awkward/to cause difficulties/to exert influence/to attract
to hold/to seize/to catch/to apprehend/to take/(used in the same way as 把[ba3]: to mark the following noun as a direct object)

to order (sb) around/to send on an errand/to order away
to report a case to the authorities (old)
forced labor of feudal tenant (corvée)/bailiff of feudal yamen
to take advantage of one's position to bully people (idiom)/to kick people around
